content.query:
--check empty lname and fname if empty count empty rows with lname and fname

SELECT count(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql];

SELECT 
sum ( case when fname is null then 1 else 0 end ) fname_empty_cnt,
sum ( case when lname is null then 1 else 0 end ) lname_empty_cnt
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
;

select dob, count(*)
from [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where dob is not null
GROUP by dob;

Select creation_date,rec_num, count(*)
FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
group by creation_date,rec_num
order by creation_date,rec_num asc;


select * 
FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]

where address4 is null;

Select  new_marker, count(*)
FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
group by new_marker
order by new_marker asc;

SELECT count(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where fname is null and lname is null;

--check if adderesses and zip are empty cout empty rows
SELECT 
sum ( case when address is null then 1 else 0 end ) add1_empty_cnt,
sum ( case when address2 is null then 1 else 0 end ) add2_empty_cnt,--can be empty
sum ( case when address3 is null then 1 else 0 end ) add3_empty_cnt,--can be empty
sum ( case when address4 is null then 1 else 0 end ) add4_empty_cnt,--can't be empty
sum ( case when address6 is null then 1 else 0 end ) add6_empty_cnt,--has to b e empty
sum ( case when zip is null then 1 else 0 end ) zip_empty_cnt
FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
 
;

select top(10) *
from [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql];

select flags, count(*)
from [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
group by flags;

SELECT hash_id, count(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
group by hash_id
having count(*)>1;
SELECT hash_id
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where hash_id is null;



--Binary Issuer Problem: 
SELECT
    MAX(LEN([part_no])) AS max_part_no_len,
    MAX(LEN([register_lett])) AS max_register_lett_len,
    MAX(LEN([new_marker])) AS max_new_marker_len,
    MAX(LEN([title])) AS max_title_len,
    MAX(LEN([lname])) AS max_lname_len,
    MAX(LEN([fname])) AS max_fname_len,
    MAX(LEN([dob])) AS max_dob_len,
    MAX(LEN([flags])) AS max_flags_len,
    MAX(LEN([address])) AS max_address_len,
    MAX(LEN([address2])) AS max_address2_len,
    MAX(LEN([address3])) AS max_address3_len,
    MAX(LEN([address4])) AS max_address4_len,
    MAX(LEN([address5])) AS max_address5_len,
    MAX(LEN([address6])) AS max_address6_len,
    MAX(LEN([zip])) AS max_zip_len,
    MAX(LEN([perm_disqual])) AS max_perm_disqual_len,
    MAX(LEN([source_id])) AS max_source_id_len,
    MAX(LEN([postcode_start])) AS max_postcode_start_len,
    MAX(LEN([hash_id])) AS max_hash_id_len,
    MAX(LEN([creation_date])) AS max_creation_date_len
FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql];

SELECT part_no, register_lett,poll_number,
     title, lname, fname, new_marker,
       dob, flags, -- Adding potentially problematic fields
       address, address2, address3, address4, address5, address6,
       date_selected1, date_selected2, date_selected3,
       zip, perm_disqual, source_id, postcode_start, hash_id, creation_date
FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql];
